ivardefs.name: condition
ivardefs.desc: Reason the encounter takes place, as specified using information from another resource. For admissions, this is the admission diagnosis. The indication will typically be a Condition (with other resources referenced in the evidence.detail), or a Procedure.

ivardefs.name: rank
ivardefs.desc: Ranking of the diagnosis (for each role type).

ivardefs.name: use
ivardefs.desc: Role that this diagnosis has within the encounter (e.g. admission, billing, discharge â€¦).

properties.desc: The list of diagnosis relevant to this encounter.
